name: ChainBuildsAwaiter
description: Awaits builds mentioned in the queuedBuilds variable. It publishes test results from that builds
author: kneradovsky

inputs.name: sleepBetweenIters
inputs.label: Seconds to sleep between queue check iterations

inputs.label: Child build passed if any its tests passed
inputs.helpMarkDown: If flag is on then the status of the main build will ignore child build tests with statuses other than pass/fail while computing its own status

messages.testRunOutcome: Test run outcome, total tests: %s, passed: %s
